name: Sahaya Women Empowement Rural And Urban Development Society
briefDescription: SAHAYA is a Women Empowerment Rural and Urban Development Society, is a voluntary organization  that serves as a resource for development of rural areas in the kinds of Women, Children.  Organization incepted in the year 2005 and spearheaded various developmental programmes to uplift the impoverished downtrodden. Our efforts are significantly inception it has progressed remarkably in its maintenance of credibility for serving the cause of development it crossed one more year. Now we covering 14500 households in 5 blocks of Medak District  in Andhra Pradesh
